pages.title: about
pages.text: Who are we?We are a team of 4 developers who have already several years of experience with windows kernel programming. We are aiming to sell anti-anti cheat tools for all EAC and BE games, like Apex, PUBG and so on. Our roles is helping you to pass the hardest part of building a cheat.
